title: Acadia National Park: Swimming
body: Swimming          Beaches   Â    Acadia National Park has two beaches staffed with lifeguards during the summer:  Sand Beach: Ocean swimming, in 55 F (13 C) water. Echo Lake Beach: somewhat warmer swimming  For information on water quality through Maine Healthy Beaches program, click here. Many other lakes and ponds are public water supplies where swimming, wading, and pets are prohibited. Please respect posted regulations.
